SELECT wcmo.push_type, wcmo.message_type, wcmo.push_range, wcm.create_by sender, wcmo.create_time sendTime, wcm.message_id, wcm.content, wcm.chat_type, wcm.setting_time, wcm.expect_send, wcm.actual_send, wcm.timed_task, wcm.msgid, wcm.check_status FROM we_customer_messageOriginal wcmo LEFT JOIN we_customer_message wcm ON wcmo.message_original_Id = wcm.original_id
AND wcm.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
AND wcmo.push_type=#{pushType}
AND date_format(wcmo.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(wcmo.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND wcm.create_by=#{sender}
ORDER BY wcmo.create_time DESC

wcm.message_id=#{messageId}
